entry.value: Retrieve Kripo fragment information for all fragments with specified PDB code.%%00010%%00010Based on KripoDB package (https://github.com/3D-e-Chem/kripodb)

from kripodb.canned import fragments_by_pdb_codes%%00010%%00010# The name of the column containing the fragment identifiers%%00010pdb_codes = input_table['pdb_code']%%00010%%00010# Location of fragment database%%00010fragments_db_filename = '/data/kripo/tiny/fragments.sqlite'%%00010%%00010# Prefix returned columns%%00010prefix = 'query_'%%00010%%00010output_table = fragments_by_pdb_codes(pdb_codes, %%00010 fragments_db_filename,%%00010 prefix)%%00010%%00010
